title: Falling rouble sees McDonald's French fries turn Russian
text:
Falling rouble sees McDonald's French fries turn Russian 01:26
French fries at McDonald's restaurants in Russia will be Russian from now on, as U.S. sanctions have spurred on a shift by the American fast-food chain to use local potatoes. Ivor Bennett reports.
